article_title: WH Twitter Account Ignores Copenhagen, ISIS, Ukraine
article_text:
SIGN UP FOR OUR NEWSLETTER

The White House Twitter Account was very active this Valentine’s Day weekend. While the account retweeted a mention the terrorist attacks this weekend in Copenhagen, Denmark, there has been no mention today of the Islamic State (ISIS/ISIL)’s latest video depicting the murder of 21 Coptic Christians in Libya.

SIGN UP FOR OUR NEWSLETTER

Instead, the account tweeted multiple times encouraging people to sign up for Obamacare. Below are screencaps showing every tweet sent by the White House on Sunday:

Give the gift of healthcare! The one tweet referencing the Denmark attacks was not a White House tweet, but a retweet of the White House National Security account. The amount of followers on that account is almost 51,000, while the official White House account has almost six million followers.

article_metadata.description: The White House tweeted multiple times encouraging people to sign up for Obamacare on Sunday, but said nothing of the Christian hostages slaughtered by ISIS.
